body:
Day 57 - 1377*
Never saw Evangelion so I can't say anything about the writing but I'm with you Murtdha, hatred for something that I never watched and never will watch.
Also, only half of this is about the cover. The rest is just some random bullshit. Not to mention that the part about the cover, Evangelion, is pretty bad.
2/10.
Evangelion is a a bad anime with a bad artist and bad writing
